hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT * FROM Department START WITH DepartmentId = :DepartmentId CONNECT BY PRIOR ParentId = DepartmentId
SELECT * FROM Department START WITH DepartmentId = :DepartmentId CONNECT BY PRIOR DepartmentId = ParentId

database-object.create:
create proc [GetDepartmentAndAncestors] @DepartmentId int as
WITH DeptHierarchy (DepartmentId, ParentId) AS ( SELECT DepartmentId, ParentId FROM dbo.Department WHERE DepartmentId = @DepartmentId
UNION ALL
SELECT D.DepartmentId, D.ParentId FROM dbo.Department D INNER JOIN DeptHierarchy DH ON (D.DepartmentId = DH.ParentId) )
SELECT D.* FROM Department D inner join DeptHierarchy DH on (D.DepartmentId = DH.DepartmentId);
RETURN

create proc [GetDepartmentAndDescendents] @DepartmentId int as
WITH DeptHierarchy (DepartmentId, ParentId) AS ( SELECT DepartmentId, ParentId FROM dbo.Department WHERE DepartmentId = @DepartmentId
UNION ALL
SELECT D.DepartmentId, D.ParentId FROM dbo.Department D INNER JOIN DeptHierarchy DH ON (D.ParentId = DH.DepartmentId) )
SELECT D.* FROM Department D inner join DeptHierarchy DH on (D.DepartmentId = DH.DepartmentId);
RETURN
